tool_description:
This Sneaker Database API allows users to get essential sneaker content such as images, product links and even prices from resell sites such as StockX, FlightClub, Goat, and Stadium Goods.

New Update -  searchByUrl Endpoint enriched with more features
name: Sneaker Database - StockX
title: Sneaker Database - StockX

api_list.name: KicksCrew Product Description
api_list.description:
Get KicksCrew Product Description

Parameter:
spu (* required)

api_list.name: KicksCrew Search
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns the search result 

Parameters:
query (* required)
hitsPerPage (Default: 16)
page (Default: 0)

api_list.name: Stockx Related Product
api_list.description:
Get stockx similar product

Parameters
urlKey  (* required)

api_list.name: Get Products
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns a collection of products.

**Parameters ** (All the parameters must be string to work, even the limit| Don't worry about the data conversion!)
-> keyword
-> limit ( Max 20 per call)

api_list.name: Get Most Popular
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns the most popular sneakers from StockX, FlightClub, Goat, and Stadium Goods.

**Parameters:**
limit

api_list.name: Simple Search
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows you to perform a simple search for products using a query parameter. It expects a GET request to the **'/simpleSearch'** URL. 

The query parameter 's' should be provided, which represents the search term.

api_list.name: Get Products Prices
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns Prices of Sneakers:

**Parameters:**
styleId

api_list.name: Stockx Product Description
api_list.description:
Get Stockx Product Description

Parameters:
urlKey (* required)

api_list.name: Goat Product Description
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves Goat Product Description

Parameter:
sku (* required)

api_list.name: Goat Search
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves goat product search.


Parameters:
query (* required)
hitsPerPage (Default: 20)

api_list.name: FightClub Product Description
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns the Product Description

Parameter:
sku (* required)

api_list.name: FightClub ProducT Recommendation
api_list.description:
Get FightClub Similar Product 

Parameter:
id (* required) This is the product_template_id.

api_list.name: FightClub Product By BRAND
api_list.description:
gET FightClub Product By BRAND

Parameters:
brand (Default: 'adidas)

api_list.name: FightClub New Releases
FightClub Search
api_list.description:
Search products on fightclub only

Parameters:
query (* required)
hitsPerPage (Default: 20)

api_list.name: Stockx Only
api_list.description:
Get Product from Stockx only.

Parameters:
search (* required - the keyword to search)
perpage (Default: 20) This is the result limit. Default will return 20 products.

api_list.name: Search By URL
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows you to extract product details from a given URL from stockx. 

It expects a GET request to the **'/searchByUrl'** URL. 

**Note that this endpoints is useful to make 1 call for every 20s, if increased the perfomance reduces and you might need to reduce the amount of calls. We are working hard to improve this limitation **

Bugs Fixed!

The query parameter 'url' should be provided, which represents the URL of the page to scrape for product information.
